title: Ring of Vitality
data:
{{obsolete}} {{flavour|This famed ring greatly improves its wearer's health}} [[File:Ring_of_vitality.png]] '''''the ring of Vitality'''''
[[Ring of regeneration|Regeneration]] ego
HP+15
==Desirability== The '''ring of Vitality''' is quite useful, as it has an excellent base type (regeneration) and an excellent, otherwise unobtainable bonus property (extra HP). Most characters will want to wear this if they find it. ==History== *The ring of Vitality was replaced with the [[amulet of Vitality]] in [[0.16]], as the regeneration ego also went to amulets. *The ring of Vitality was added in [[0.10]]. [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Rings]] [[Category:Obsolete items]]
